hackathon-rules:
Pretty simple rules -- play it nice and have fun!
1.
2. You may not work on your project before the event begins.
3. You cannot steal another team's source code.
4. The decisions of judges is final for determining prizes and awards.
5. The ownership of the code will be at the discretion of the hackers and the NGOs. Please discuss this before beginning work on the solution.
